full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 124 of 228 800 LC2VMAX4 Alessi - Direct 1 Q. Indicating the -- well, are you indicating the top left right now? 2 A. The helper's quarters. 3 Q. And is that at the top left of this exhibit? 4 A. Yes. 5 Q. Okay. 6 A. And also it was a wall that I used to call the Berlin Wall, 7 that it was all -- was constructed all the way to the fence and 8 the structure was here. 9 Q. After that structure was built, where did you spend the 10 night when Mr. Epstein was in Palm Beach? 11 A. After this structure was finished, I moved from my room in 12 the second floor to a room in the back of the structure. 13 Q. And the wall you described, what view did it obstruct? 14 A. It obstruct the whole view of the garden and the pool, so 15 it was no view from the staff quarters to the rest of the 16 house. 17 Q. Thank you. I'll clear that and we can take that down, 18 Ms. Drescher. 19 Q. When Ms. Maxwell was in Palm Beach, where would she 20 sleep at night? 21 A. 99 percent -- 22 MR. PAGLIUCA: Your Honor, I'm going to object to the 23 foundation of this question. We're lacking a date certain 24 here. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012409
